item.title: Advent of Code 2021
item.description: Every year, Advent of Code publishes a coding challenge each day of the Advent calendar. The problems are fun and Christmassy, what’s not to love? It’s also a great way to practice coding in a language you want to become more familiar with. For the two December meetings, 2 Dec and 9 Dec, I propose we spend the hour trying out the puzzles together and comparing our solutions :) Note that 9 Dec will be our last meeting before the Christmas break.
item.content:
Every year, Advent of Code publishes a coding challenge each day of the Advent calendar. The problems are fun and Christmassy, what’s not to love? It’s also a great way to practice coding in a language you want to become more familiar with.

For the two December meetings, 2 Dec and 9 Dec, I propose we spend the hour trying out the puzzles together and comparing our solutions :)

Note that 9 Dec will be our last meeting before the Christmas break.
